Included in this repository is the following:

1.) run_analysis.R  -  Script to run from the default directory which includes the dataset as well.  The mean and sd was taken from all 
    561 variables from each activity and subject and added to the end as two new columns.  Script is documented.     

2.)  code book  - lists the column descriptions of the data.  

3.)  README.md


This script will create a file called "step_5_data.txt"" in the default directory.  Run script from default directory where the data us residing.
